title: Layout Open Space / Recreational Open Space - means a statutory common open space kept in any layout, sub-division or group housing scheme or campus planning exclusive of margins and approaches
clause_text: Layout Open Space / Recreational Open Space - means a statutory common open space kept in any layout, sub-division or group housing scheme or campus planning exclusive of margins and approaches.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
